name: Joy Division Original Version
description: The idea behind this experiment is to recreate the album cover of Unknown Pleasures by Joy Division. This design represents the wavelengths emitted by the first discovered pulsar CP 1919, which was later transformed into an album cover by Peter Saville. This aims to explore how scientific data can be transformed into digital art. Describes the coding process and implementation choices and gives a high level system overview.
